name: Radxa CM3 on Raspberry Pi Compute Module 4 IO Board

instructions: Use the maskrom mode instructions supplied by the vendor and ensure the device's MicroUSB port is used for provisioning.
Install on your PC the rockchip flash tools required for flashing.
Clear eMMC and set it in UMS mode. Make sure to use this loader when following the USB provisioning instructions.
Once the OS has been written to the eMMC you need to repower your board. Make sure you take into account the power on instructions.
